integrity.description: What percent of blocks should be placed

posX.description: Offset of the structure on the x axis

posY.description: Offset of the structure on the y axis

posZ.description: Offset of the structure on the z axis

powered.description: If the structure block is powered by redstone

showair.description: Should the structure block show air

showboundingbox.description: Should the structure block show the bounding box

sizeX.description: Size of the structure on the x axis. (Length)

sizeY.description: Size of the structure on the y axis. (Height)

sizeZ.description: Size of the structure on the z axis. (Width)
